english_example_sentence: If you speak correctly on this difficult topic, everyone will understand you.
russian_example_sentence: Если ты правильно выскажешься по этой сложной теме, все тебя поймут.
turkish_example_sentence: Sen bu zor konuda doğru konuşsan, herkes seni anlar.
turkish_example_sentence_with_blank: Sen bu zor konuda doğru ______, herkes seni anlar.
